sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tutorial', templateUrl: './tutorial.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tutorial.component.css'] }) export class TutorialComponent { }

What is SimpCity?

A city-building strategy game that is played over 16 turns

In each turn, you will build one of two randomly-selected buildings in your 4x4 city

In the first turn, you can choose to build anywhere in the city

Subsequent turns, you can only build on tiles that are connected to existing buildings

The other building that you did not build is discarded

Objectives

As the mayor of Simp City, you want to build the happiest and most prosperous city possible.

For every building you build in your city, you will be awarded with points

Each building provides their own way of getting more points
